aboutCards.heading: Columbia Sycamore Tree
aboutCards.description: This is the Big Tree By the library. With a little more description to lengthen.

aboutCards.heading: Tree Towards Center Campus
aboutCards.description: This is a tree By Center campus to the north just past the sidewalk.

aboutCards.heading: Densely branched tree behind Coover
aboutCards.description: This tree is located behind Coover Hall. It's in a prime location for a post-TLA study session climb!

aboutCards.heading: Tree next to Sukup Sign
aboutCards.description: This tree is located next to the Sukup Hall and Atrium sign.

aboutCards.heading: Tree near Gilman
aboutCards.description: This welcoming tree is located near Gilman, with plenty of low hanging branches for accessible climbing
